title: Contextual Fairness in Clinical AI
abstract: We analyze calibration gaps and propose ADAPT auditing.

title: Power-law Patterns in Music Virality
abstract: We show heavy-tail distributions in streaming metrics.

title: Evaluating RAG with QAEvalChain
abstract: We benchmark retrieval QA pipelines via question consistency.

title: Trajectory-as-Exemplar Prompting
abstract: Demonstrates agent control via exemplar trajectories.

title: Health App Symptom Insights
abstract: Structured intake for empathetic question generation.
